description: This file initializes a LightningJS application by importing the 'start' function from '@lightningjs/blits' and the main App component from './App.js'. It then starts the application with specified canvas dimensions.

methods.name: start
methods.description: Initializes and starts the LightningJS application with the specified component and configuration.

calls: start(App, { w: 1280, h: 720, canvas: { width: 1280, height: 720 } })
